personal.name: Munagapati Mahesh Babu
personal.title: Frontend Developer (Vue.js | React.js)
personal.summary: Frontend Developer with nearly 3 years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using Vue.js and React. Experienced in designing modern frontend architecture, developing reusable component systems, and implementing real-time features. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code, optimizing performance, and delivering intuitive, reliable user experiences that solve real business problems and scale efficiently.

highlights.title: Micro-Frontend Architecture
highlights.description: Built and shipped production apps using Single-SPA, integrating Vue.js and React.js modules into a unified platform.

highlights.title: Reusable Component Library
highlights.description: Designed a shared UI library powering critical modules like Expert Agent and Asset Monitor.

highlights.title: Real-Time Dashboards
highlights.description: Created live-streaming dashboards with Server-Sent Events for instant data visualization.

highlights.title: Vue 2 → Vue 3 Migration
highlights.description: Led a zero-downtime migration of the Document Library module, improving performance and maintainability.

highlights.title: Access Control System
highlights.description: Implemented enterprise-grade RBAC and policy-based access control across all application modules.

highlights.title: Performance Optimization
highlights.description: Applied lazy loading, code splitting, and dynamic imports to dramatically improve load times and Core Web Vitals.

achievements: On-the-Spot Award (2023–2024): Vue 2 to Vue 3 migration delivered under tight deadlines with zero production incidents.
Spot-Light Award (2024–2025): Built the RBAC system that secured all application modules.

education.degree:
Bachelor of Engineering
Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: VibeChatly
projects.description: A simple AI chat app built with React and Groq AI. Chat with AI, save conversations, and get instant responses. Features include markdown support with code highlighting, dark mode, and conversation history.
